    Born in Abia state, Nigeria, Pablo James began his career as a professional photographer in Lagos, Nigeria. Upon his return to Nigeria after bagging an MSc degree from the university of Greenwich, UK, Aham bought his first camera and settled into becoming a free lance amateur photographer.

    In 2012, Aham decided to take his career professionally and focus on portrait, beauty and fashion photography. After his move to to Lagos, he worked with actors O.C Ukeje, Taiwo Ajayi-Lycett, Linda Ejiofor, Beverly Naya, Osas Ighodaro, Uru Eke, and Dakore Akande. Musicians such as Brymo, Di’Ja, Reekado Banks, Korede Bello, Eva Alordiah, Bez Idakula, Oritse Femi, Tonye Garrick, SDC, Tope Oshin, Wizkid, Banky W, Seyi Shay, Timi Dakolo, Genevieve Nnaji and Muna Abii.

    His commercial clients include Union Bank, Access Bank, Guinness, London Business School, AMVCA, Nuraniya, Genevieve magazine, Vanguard Allure, Kimono Collection, Taryor Gabriels, T.A’Lamode Makeup, JZO Fashion, Dudu Osun, and House of Tara. Aha lives in Lagos, but follows his work around Nigeria.
